dt: {bc}to cleanse, wipe, or moisten with or as if with a sponge
{bc}to erase or destroy with or as if with a sponge
{bc}to absorb with or as if with or in the manner of a sponge
{bc}to absorb, soak up, or imbibe like a sponge
{bc}to get something from or live on another by imposing on hospitality or good nature

shortdef: to cleanse, wipe, or moisten with or as if with a sponge
to erase or destroy with or as if with a sponge —often used with out
to get by sponging on another
